name: Seeds Life
summary:
You are a one of a kind plant : as time goes by, you evolve and change.

Each of the mutations has his own gameplay. Find your way throught the 2 levels and be careful, when you reach your last evolution, you have to plant yourself in the ground to be reborn anew.
